ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Contract Status is terminated when stage is moved to discontinued.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Research_Partnership", ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Discontinued"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Pure_Project_ID__r.Pure_CLMS_Contract_Status__c , "Terminated")) )
